channel.title: vuln.be: hacks and tricks
channel.description: Various interesting things related to security and engineering

item.title: ModSecurity WAF in Kubernetes
item.description: Using OWASP ModSecurity Core Rule Set and custom ModSecurity rules in Kubernetes NGINX Ingress controller to block Spring4Shell (CVE-2022-22965) exploits.
item.dc:creator: Alexey Pronin

item.title: OS command and code execution in Erlang and Elixir applications
item.description: Execution of OS commands and code evaluation are dangerous operations when they use untrusted user input. This post reviews Erlang and Elixir functions related to the topic.
item.dc:creator: Alexey Pronin

item.title: XML External Entity in Erlang and Elixir
item.description: Some Erlang and Elixir XML libraries prevent XXE by default, and some allow embedding external entities, so it is necessary to make an effort to secure the application from potential vulnerabilities.
item.dc:creator: Alexey Pronin

item.title: XXE and OS command injections in Yaws
item.description: Yaws is a web server for Erlang applications. As a result of research, I found an XXE injection in a WebDAV module and OS command injection in a CGI module.
item.dc:creator: Alexey Pronin

item.title: OS command injection in Rebar3
item.description: Rebar3 is a tool widely used for building applications in the Erlang world. It is quite dangerous. With the tool, you can get OS command execution in different ways and sometimes in ways not intended by developers.
item.dc:creator: Alexey Pronin

item.title: Controversial certificate management using Step
item.description: DevOps methodology implies faster development, increased reliability, and sometimes security. Many new tools have emerged to fulfill the DevOps needs. Many of them rely on the PKI or even manage the PKI somehow.
item.dc:creator: Alexey Pronin

item.title: Microsoft Office 365 email spoofing
item.description:
«Securely run and grow your business» - says the advertisment on the Microsoft webpage that tells about email services for business customers.

Not belive!
item.dc:creator: Alexey Pronin

item.title: Short story about «Orion Pro»: access control system without access control
item.description: Once during a pentest on one of the hosts on WI-FI network I discovered a lot of open ports (XML-RPC).
item.dc:creator: Alexey Pronin

item.title: MacOS local DNS
item.description: Sometimes you need to use DNS on non-standard port. MacOS does not allow that. The following recipe helps to overcome this restriction.
item.dc:creator: Alexey Pronin

item.title: Burp Suite Pro 1.7.31 Loader & Keygen reverse engineering
item.description: One sleepless night I decided to investigate how Burp Suite Pro 1.7.31 Loader & Keygen written by surferxyz works.
item.dc:creator: Alexey Pronin
